titleStmt.title: A clergy-man of the Church of England his vindication of himself for reading His Majesties late declaration. With allowance.
titleStmt.author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and publish'd by Randal Taylor, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Edmund Ellis, Rector of East-Alling in Devon.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
